Quadratic Equations.name: Quadratic Formula
Quadratic Equations.description: x: solution, a, b, c: coefficients of the quadratic equation

Quadratic Equations.name: Completing the Square
Quadratic Equations.description: A method to rewrite a quadratic equation in vertex form by forming a perfect square.

Quadratic Equations.name: Discriminant
Quadratic Equations.description: Determines the nature of the roots of a quadratic equation.

Quadratic Equations.name: Factoring Quadratics
Quadratic Equations.description: A method of solving quadratic equations by expressing them as a product of two linear factors.

Polynomials.name: Binomial Theorem
Polynomials.description: Expands a binomial raised to a positive integer power.

Polynomials.name: Remainder Theorem
Polynomials.description: Expresses a polynomial f(x) in terms of a divisor (x-k), its quotient q(x), and remainder f(k).

Polynomials.name: Factor Theorem
Polynomials.description: Relates the factors of a polynomial to its zeros.

Polynomials.name: Polynomial Long Division
Polynomials.description: A method to divide one polynomial by another of lower degree.

Exponents and Logarithms.name: Laws of Exponents
Exponents and Logarithms.description: Fundamental properties of exponents used to simplify expressions.

Exponents and Logarithms.name: Change of Base Formula
Exponents and Logarithms.description: Converts logarithms from one base to another.

Exponents and Logarithms.name: Logarithm Rules
Exponents and Logarithms.description: Product, quotient, and power rules for logarithms.

Exponents and Logarithms.name: Exponential Growth and Decay
Exponents and Logarithms.description: Models growth or decay processes where the rate is proportional to the current value.

Systems of Equations.name: Cramer's Rule
Systems of Equations.description: Uses determinants to solve a system of linear equations.

Sequences and Series.name: Arithmetic Series Sum
Sequences and Series.description: Calculates the sum of the first n terms of an arithmetic sequence.

Sequences and Series.name: Geometric Series Sum
Sequences and Series.description: Computes the sum of the first n terms of a geometric sequence.

Sequences and Series.name: Infinite Geometric Series
Sequences and Series.description: Gives the sum of an infinite geometric series when the common ratio's absolute value is less than one.

Complex Numbers.name: Euler's Formula
Complex Numbers.description: Relates complex exponentials to trigonometric functions.

Complex Numbers.name: Complex Conjugate
Complex Numbers.description: Defines the complex conjugate of a complex number.

Factoring Techniques.name: Difference of Squares
Factoring Techniques.description: Expresses the difference of two squares as the product of two binomials.

Factoring Techniques.name: Sum of Cubes
Factoring Techniques.description: A formula to factor the sum of two cubes.

Factoring Techniques.name: Difference of Cubes
Factoring Techniques.description: A formula to factor the difference of two cubes.

Inequalities.name: Linear Inequality
Inequalities.description: A basic linear inequality in one variable.

Inequalities.name: Quadratic Inequality
Inequalities.description: An inequality involving a quadratic expression.

Absolute Value Equations.name: Absolute Value Equation
Absolute Value Equations.description: An equation involving the absolute value of a linear expression.

Absolute Value Equations.name: Absolute Value Inequality
Absolute Value Equations.description: An inequality involving the absolute value of a linear expression.
